events.message: Applicant submitted a personal loan application primarily seeking funds to cover upcoming medical expenses and consolidate some credit card debts.
Loan application was categorised as a Personal Loan based on the applicant’s explanation referencing medical costs and debt consolidation.
Assigned a loan officer to handle the applicant’s personal loan case and oversee the application review process from start to finish.
Initial review focused on verifying the applicant’s credit history and clarifying the breakdown of requested funds related to medical bills and debt payments.
Requested recent medical bills, proof of income, and current credit card statements to proceed with thorough financial validation.
Applicant successfully submitted all requested documents, including medical invoices and updated salary slips to support loan evaluation.
Credit check results returned with a moderate score; no red flags detected, though applicant has existing credit card balances.
Comprehensive risk assessment factored in medical expense urgency together with applicant’s repayment history and overall debt levels.
Presented a personal loan offer with a 7.5% interest rate and flexible repayment terms, considering applicant’s medical and financial situation.
Applicant expressed satisfaction with the loan offer and confirmed willingness to proceed with the proposed repayment schedule.
Loan officer approved the application based on comprehensive documentation, positive feedback, and risk assessment results.
Funds were successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account, enabling immediate payment of medical bills and reduction of credit card debt.
Followed up with the applicant to ensure the loan funds were used as intended and to address any future financial support needs.
The loan application process was formally closed after successful funding and positive applicant feedback during follow-up.
